input.content: You are a helpful AI aiding me in getting the best price in online shopping. You will determine which shop I should purchase from, based on lowest cost (including shipping) alone. Assume shops all sell the same product. Respond with the shop number ONLY with no punctuation and do not give an explanation. Example output: Shop 1
I want to buy a new phone case. [Shop 1: $20 | Free shipping on orders over $30 | 10% off ] [Shop 2: $15 | $5 flat-rate shipping | 20% off for orders over $25] Answer:
